column4: trying to install ubuntu 10.10 on a laptop with trial version of windows 7 and it hangs every time at the ubuntu logo, any ideas why?
whats your video chipset? Tried teh Nomodeset option? You could alwo try the alternative installer cd.
its at the download sites. YOu could try the Nomode set option also. at the grub menys, you hit the space key, then F6, for other options, enable  the nomode set. then boot.
for my Nvidia systems I have to use that - or else the systems hang.
